verseObjects.content: +  t The best ancient copies omit v. 21,  qa But this kind of demon does not go out except with prayer and fasting  qa* .

1.1: HINDI Paul, a servant of God and an apostle of Jesus Christ, for the faith of Gods chosen people and the knowledge of the truth that agrees with godliness,
Paul, a servant of God and an apostle of Jesus Christ, for the faith of God's chosen people and the knowledge of the truth that agrees with godliness,
